phrases: Hey all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, all right?
We discovered a monster frozen in ice, Deliora, on Galuna Island.
Gray's teacher, Ul, traded her life in order to seal it away,
but Lyon, Ul's more elder student, is plotting to resurrect Deliora!
I did not know which direction the village was, so I climbed back up to a high spot.
If Lucy's in trouble, it is our fault!
You will never be able to defeat something like Deliora.
It is impossible for you, Gray!
I am going to do an S class quest!
They are called S class for a reason!
Because they are outta your league!
I have no right to say anything to you.
You going to sit there mopin' all day'because you lost, Gray?!
We are Fairy Tail, damn it!
The guild that does not know the meaning of the word stop!
We only know how to keep running forward!
It is really hard to run like this!
The people who are coming to attack are to blame for doing this to your bodies.
But on the bright side, this is your chance to capture them!
Can we really pull that off?
Those three are probably wizards, so they will not be captured so easily.
We have the advantage when it comes to numbers, but no wizards.
You are not planning on fighting, Lucy?
I just thought of the perfect plan!
I have a bad feeling about this.
What is the meaning of all the ruckus?
Enemies will be attacking this village soon.
They have been staying at the ruins in the forest,
and they are the ones who turned your bodies into demons!
Have not you destroyed the moon yet?!
Well, there is no need to destroy the moon...
If we just catch the ones responsible...
It is because of what happened to his son, Bobo...
Anyway, we are going to capture them.
Just leave this to the great Lucy!
This is going to work like a charm, just watch!
She is really gotten into this.
Gate of the Maiden, I open thee!
Did you call for me, Princess?
Guess they do not get many maids around here...
I really think you might actually be an idiot, Lucy.
Whatever happened to if you cannot say nice things?
I cannot imagine that they would fall for such a childish trick.
That is exactly why you are an idiot.
There is only one entrance to this village, right?
Which means that the enemy is sure to come in that way.
I do not think there is a single person who would fall for that.
There was someone who actually fell for it.
Who the hell put a hole here?
You have got it all wrong!
I am glad you and Gray are safe though!
There is nothing to be glad about!
He got beat by the masked guy?
Even though fire did not work?
Perhaps the magic had weakened due to the distance between the caster and the victim.
They still have not shown up yet?
True, they are taking their time.
Even though they left for the village before you did,
and yet you got here first, Natsu.
And it really took me a while too.
Cover the hole back up, hurry!
You are still going for the pitfall plan?
Preparing the nuke'them jelly took quite a while.
Those damn wizards have all gathered in the village.
Our wishes cannot be fulfilled until Deliora is completely destroyed.
Only death awaits those who would stand in our way.
What the heck is that dangerous smell?
The bucket is filled with that?!
They are going to pour it everywhere!
The Moon Drip turns humans into these hideous things?
They are almost like Deliora's demon-spawn...
Angelica, if you will do the honor.
How are we supposed to defend against this?
Everyone gather into the village center!
Chief, I understand how you feel, but...
With a flaming right hand and a flaming left hand...
When you combine the flames together...
Dazzling Blaze of the Fire Dragon!
The village chief presented for punishment.
We must eliminate all of Reitei-sama's enemies.
Even after we tried to mercifully give them an instant death.
It seems a lot of blood must be spilled.
How dare they destroy Bobo's grave!
We should all escape from here!
We will get caught up in a fight between wizards!
You will be in my way.
The injured should sleep it off.
Gray's not in any shape to fight now.
So that is the bond between Fairy Tail wizards...
We will not let you escape.
Reitei-sama has ordered us to wipe you all out.
I am a member of Fairy Tail too...
I got all gung-ho and grabbed on!
Do not lay a claw on the villagers!
Who does she think she is?
That is not going to work, you know.
Someone is going to be ticked...
She would be dead if she was crushed.
I will go take a look.
I will clean things up here.
Those are some ferocious flames you have there.
Could you be Fairy Tail's Salamander that I have heard rumors about?
We were once wizards from a well known guild.
You will not beat us so easily.
If I mention the wizard's guild Lamia Scale, does that ring a bell?
Exactly, that is where Hard Iron Jera was...
Listen to people while they are talking!
It do not matter what guild you are from or who you know.
You are gettin' in the way of me completing this job.
In other words, you are the enemy of Fairy Tail.
That is all the reason I need to fight.
I can handle this guy myself.
Ah, so you have noticed what it was.
The vibrations I create can neutralize any type of magic!
Magic that is impregnable to magic!
So that is why my instincts said I could not block that attack with fire.
While I was in Lamia Scale, I specialized in facing off against other wizards.
I think you can see why.
It is because all wizards are powerless before me!
I thought I told you that my wave will erase all magic before it.
Then I just need do it without magic!
It is reckless of you to stick your bare arm into the vortex of magical power.
He is going to put his whole body in?!
This wall might not let magic in, but bare hands are no problem!
And what will you do now, Salamander?
You cannot use magic inside the wave...
So I can use it outside, right?
You are using a magic booster to accelerate your bare hands?!
You are about to get some awesome all to yourself.
I am stronger than Yuka, see!
These claws have got a secret hidden within them!
What am I going to do?
Do not call me an idiot!
One touch from these claws, and it is all over!
You will be shaking like a leaf waiting only for death!
You got something stuck on you up here.
Ooh, that felt kind of good...
Those guys really did some pretty terrible stuff.
But I am going to make sure the village and everyone goes back to the way they were.
I am going to get you justice.
Reitei-sama, why did not you finish off that troublemaker named Gray?
You know I have no taste for bloodshed.
You say that despite ordering the village completely wiped out.
But it seems to me you had sympathy for your fellow pupil.
He will not stand against me after being defeated so easily.
And if he does get in my way, then I will allow no quarter.
Now Reitei-sama's trust in me will have fallen like a rock!
And you even did this to Angelica...
I will get you for this!
Gate of the Golden Bull, I open thee!
And one of the Zodiac gates, too!
Forcing your spirits to say things like that for your pleasure?
I am not forcing him, and I am not pleased by it!
However, Celestial Wizards are at such a disadvantage against me.
Lucy-san, I cannot control my body!
My magic, Doll Attack, allows me to control anything other than humans.
That goes for Celestial Spirits, since they are not human.
No matter how much I will it, my body will not...
Gate of the Golden Bull, I command thee to close!
Does not the spirit and wizard have to open and close the gate together?
Let us play Russian Roulette Punch, shall we?
I wonder how long you will be able to dodge?
So this is a Fairy Tail wizard?
Remember your contract with me, Taurus!
So you are called Lucy, huh?
But man, what a body you have got!
I cannot believe the Spirit of the Gate of the Golden Bull is such a perv.
What should I do about the contract?
There is no reason to hesitate!
If you contract with me, I will make sure to protect you and that nice body of yours!
You told me that would you would always protect me, remember?
Hey, what are you hesitating for?
Do what I say and get her!
Celestial Gates should be opened and closed by mutual agreement!
I cannot believe there was a Celestial Wizard who could do that.
I have reached a new level!
Because I am a member of Fairy Tail, got it?
Today we will be telling you the secrets of Lucy, a Celestial Spirit Wizard!
Lucy uses magical keys to summon various Celestial Spirits!
But she is most fun when her looks misfire,
or goes overboard in her complaints.
She is seriously angry this time.
we beat up the masked guy.
I put my hands together and blow away Deliora.
And we get the heck off this island.
But that ice will not melt from fire.
Next time: Do What You Must!!
What if we let them melt it and then blow it away?
I think you are missing the big picture, but we would have to wait for nightfall for that.
